import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Card = ({ img, name, num, id, type, nextEvolution, height, weight, weaknesses}) => { const [show, toggleShow] = useState(false); return ( <> toggleShow(!show)}> {num} {name} {type} {show ? 'Less -' : 'More +'} { show &&

More info

{name} evolves into {nextEvolution}

Height

{height}

Weight

{weight}

Type

{type}

Weaknesses

{weaknesses}

} ) } export default Card
